sequences.name: North America Enterprise Marketplaces - Revenue Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: North America Enterprise Marketplaces - Revenue Leaders
sequences.objective: Start a conversation about automating seller payouts, reducing chargebacks, and scaling KYC/tax for multi-jurisdiction marketplaces.

touches.objective: Introduce delayed seller payouts and manual reconciliation
touches.subject_line: Cut seller payout errors for large marketplace ops
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} is scaling seller volumes across North America. Many enterprise marketplaces I talk to struggle with delayed seller payouts and manual reconciliation—leading to seller churn and finance headaches. We helped a 1,200-seller marketplace automate onboarding, split payments and payouts, reducing reconciliation errors 70%. Interested in a 10‑min call to discuss if that could help you?
touches.hints: Reference a recent marketplace growth metric (new sellers, GMV growth) or public expansion news

touches.objective: Share a case study on chargeback/fraud reduction
touches.subject_line: How one marketplace cut cross-region chargebacks 40%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, shared a quick note — marketplaces we've worked with saw cross-region fraud and chargebacks drop significantly after adding real-time global fraud signals. If chargebacks are increasing as you expand regions, I can send a short case study.
touches.hints: Mention a competitor or well-known marketplace in North America (if public) to increase relevancy

touches.objective: Deep dive on KYC and tax scaling pain for compliance teams
touches.subject_line: Scaling KYC & tax reporting across regions
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, compliance teams at enterprise marketplaces often spend weeks on manual KYC and tax filings across states/provinces. For example, a marketplace we partnered with cut manual KYC checks by ~80% and automated VAT/sales tax reporting across 12 jurisdictions. If your compliance team is stretched, I can share how they implemented automated KYC + tax flows.
touches.hints: Personalize by referencing any public note about multi-jurisdiction seller base or recent regulatory changes affecting their market

touches.objective: Direct meeting request to discuss finance and fraud reduction
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up on the KYC/payout/fraud note — would you be open to a 15‑minute call next week to explore reducing payout errors and chargebacks for {{company}}? I can bring a short storyboard of how similar marketplaces automated payouts and fraud prevention.
touches.hints: Call script: reference the specific case study and offer two 15-min slot options

touches.objective: Provide social proof and a relevant metric
touches.subject_line: Marketplace finance playbook for faster payouts
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, sharing a 90‑sec overview: how an enterprise marketplace automated split payouts and reduced seller disputes 60%. If you want, I can DM the one‑page playbook.
touches.hints: Offer a single-doc playbook or short video — keep it easy to consume

touches.objective: Breakup / last attempt with alternative value
touches.subject_line: One last note on reducing seller payout friction
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, last note — if seller payouts, cross-region chargebacks, or KYC/tax scaling are on your roadmap this quarter, I can share specific implementation timings and ROI we saw with enterprise marketplaces. If not, is there someone on your team I should speak with?
touches.hints: If no response, suggest a low-effort next step (share case study with their finance/compliance lead)

sequences.name: United States Mid-Market E-commerce - Commerce Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: United States Mid-Market E-commerce - Commerce Leaders
sequences.objective: Open a conversation about lowering mobile cart abandonment, unifying online/in-store reconciliation, and automating sales tax.

touches.objective: Introduce mobile cart abandonment on cross-border/mobile flows
touches.subject_line: Reduce mobile cart abandonment for US shoppers
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, noticed {{company}} drives a large share of traffic from mobile and cross-border shoppers. Many mid-market commerce teams see high mobile cart abandonment and authorization failures on international cards. We implemented localized checkout + fraud protections for a retailer and lifted mobile conversions 8–12%. Worth a quick chat?
touches.hints: Personalize with mobile traffic % or a recent international shipping rollout

touches.objective: Share a short case study on localized checkout and auth rates
touches.subject_line: How one brand boosted mobile auth rates 10%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, wanted to share a short case study — adding localized payment flows and prebuilt fraud protections increased authorization and cut decline rates for a US mid-market brand. Happy to DM the summary.
touches.hints: Reference a comparable brand size or product category

touches.objective: Deep dive on reconciling online and in-store sales
touches.subject_line: Unify online & in-store ledgers to cut reconciliation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, commerce ops often waste hours reconciling online orders with in-store/terminal sales. We helped a 30-store brand unify Payments + Terminal into a single ledger, cutting close time and reconciliation headcount. If delayed closes are slowing your finance team, I can outline the integration.
touches.hints: If they have stores, mention number of locations or POS provider if known

touches.objective: Request a short call to review checkout/localization and tax risk
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick ask — can we do 15 minutes to run through mobile checkout friction and how automated tax calculation at checkout could reduce manual remediation across states? I have examples specific to US sales tax scenarios.
touches.hints: Offer specific times and mention you'll tailor the call to their checkout/vendor setup

touches.objective: Follow-up with alternative resource (playbook/demo)
touches.subject_line: Playbook: faster checkout + simpler tax filing
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up — attached is a short playbook on localized checkout and automated tax filing for mid-market commerce. If you'd prefer, I can connect with your payments or ops lead to walk through specifics.
touches.hints: Attach or link to a 1‑page playbook and suggest an internal intro

sequences.name: California Large B2B SaaS - Finance & Ops Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: California Large B2B SaaS - Finance & Ops Leaders
sequences.objective: Get a meeting to discuss reducing failed renewals, automating usage billing and accelerating revenue insights.

touches.objective: Introduce revenue leakage from failed renewals and manual collections
touches.subject_line: Reduce failed renewals and lower DSO
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, I saw {{company}} recently grew ARR — congrats. Many large SaaS finance teams face revenue leakage from failed renewals and manual collections, which increases DSO. We worked with a 500‑ACV SaaS to automate renewals + embedded payments, reducing failed renewals by 30% and shaving weeks off collections. Worth 15 minutes to compare notes?
touches.hints: Personalize with public ARR/valuation/funding or a recent product release that increases renewals risk

touches.objective: Share customer example on usage-based billing automation
touches.subject_line: How a SaaS shortened billing cycles by 50%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick share — a large SaaS cleaned up complex usage billing and shortened month‑end close by automating usage metering and revenue recognition. Happy to send the one‑page case study.
touches.hints: If they publish usage-pricing, mention that as a conversation starter

touches.objective: Deep dive on product-level revenue insights and Sigma analytics
touches.subject_line: Product-level revenue insights without long SQL projects
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, finance teams often lack product-level revenue visibility, slowing pricing and GTM decisions. We’ve enabled finance & ops teams to get SQL-powered dashboards and churn/payment analytics in days (not months), cutting analysis time ~70%. Can I show a 5‑minute example dashboard for your billing model?
touches.hints: Offer to show a dashboard filtered for their top 3 products or plans

touches.objective: Request a meeting to map renewal automation and billing integration
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, could we book 20 minutes to map how you handle renewals, usage billing and month‑end close? I’ll bring examples of integrations with common accounting systems and typical timelines.
touches.hints: Suggest 2 time windows and ask who else on their team should join

touches.objective: Share a short ROI snapshot
touches.subject_line: ROI snapshot: fewer failed renewals, faster close
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, sharing an ROI snapshot: typical large SaaS reduce failed renewals 20–35% and shorten billing cycles 30–60% after automation. If useful, I can tailor the numbers to your current ARR and churn rates.
touches.hints: Offer to run a 2-min numbers exercise if they share ARR/churn estimates

touches.objective: Final follow-up with low-friction next step
touches.subject_line: Quick ROI run for {{company}}'s renewals?
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, final follow-up — if it helps, I can run a 5‑minute ROI calc for failed renewals and billing automation using a couple of your public metrics. If not, would you point me to the right person?
touches.hints: Provide a one-click calendar link and offer to work with a finance ops counterpart

sequences.name: United Kingdom Small Marketplaces - Founders & Product Outreach Sequence
sequences.persona_name: United Kingdom Small Marketplaces - Founders & Product
sequences.objective: Book a short call to help founders launch seller payouts quickly, reduce engineering lift for localized checkout, and automate KYC.

touches.objective: Introduce slow seller payouts and go-to-market delays
touches.subject_line: Enable first seller payouts in weeks, not months
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, launching a marketplace in the UK often stalls on payouts — founders tell me seller payouts and manual onboarding delay their GTM. Connect can enable seller onboarding and payouts in weeks so you can pay early sellers faster. Want a 10‑min runthrough of how that looks?
touches.hints: Reference their launch stage (beta sellers, waitlist) or a recent product/feature launch

touches.objective: Share no-code checkout options to reduce engineering lift
touches.subject_line: No-code localized checkout for UK buyers
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, small marketplaces often lack engineering bandwidth to localize checkout. Payment Links / hosted Checkout can reduce build time dramatically. I can share examples of founders who launched UK checkout with minimal eng effort.
touches.hints: If they use a popular e-comm stack, mention it and how Payment Links integrate

touches.objective: Deep dive on automated KYC for scaling seller verification
touches.subject_line: Cut manual seller verification by ~80%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, many small marketplaces can’t scale seller verification, increasing fraud risk. Identity automation reduced manual KYC time by ~80% for a UK marketplace while keeping verification rates high. If scaling sellers is on your roadmap, I can share the implementation steps we used.
touches.hints: Mention if they’re operating in multiple UK regions or plan EU expansion

touches.objective: Request a short meeting to discuss launch/payout timeline
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, quick ask — can we do 15 minutes to map a path to first payouts and scalable KYC for your marketplace? I’ll bring a simple checklist founders use to get payouts live.
touches.hints: Offer times and propose to include their lead engineer or ops founder

sequences.name: ANZ Mid-Large Hospitality - Operations Leaders Outreach Sequence
sequences.objective: Start a conversation about unifying guest payments across channels, reducing chargebacks with regional fraud signals, and automating multi-currency vendor/staff payouts.

touches.objective: Introduce inconsistent guest payments across online and in-store channels
touches.subject_line: Unify online & in-store payments for hospitality
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, hotels and venues in ANZ often wrestle with inconsistent guest payments across online and in‑store, which creates reconciliation headaches. Terminal + Payments can unify transactions into one ledger and reduce accounting overhead. Interested in a quick example specific to multi-location ops?
touches.hints: Personalize by referencing number of locations or booking/reservation platform

touches.objective: Share fraud/chargeback reduction story for regional markets
touches.subject_line: Lower ANZ chargebacks by up to 35%
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, sharing a short note — using regional fraud signals and real‑time blocking reduced chargebacks up to 35% for hospitality brands in ANZ. If chargebacks are eating margins at your locations, I can send short results.
touches.hints: Mention local chargeback drivers (cardholder disputes after bookings) if known

touches.objective: Deep dive on automating multi-currency vendor and staff payouts
touches.subject_line: Automate scheduled multi-currency payouts for venues
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, many multi-location hospitality ops manually process vendor/staff payouts, causing payroll errors. Payouts can automate scheduled, multi-currency payments and reduce manual errors — one hotel group cut payout errors by 90%. Can I share the typical rollout plan?
touches.hints: If they operate across ANZ with local vendors, call out multi-currency complexity

touches.objective: Request a meeting to review payments, fraud, and payout automation
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, could we take 20 minutes to map how unified payments + Radar + Payouts might lower chargebacks, reconcile faster, and remove manual payroll tasks at {{company}}? I’ll bring an ANZ-specific example.
touches.hints: Offer 2 time slots and propose including finance/ops lead

touches.objective: Follow-up with regional playbook and next steps
touches.subject_line: ANZ hospitality playbook: fewer chargebacks, faster payouts
touches.content_suggestion: Hi {{first_name}}, following up with a short ANZ hospitality playbook: steps to unify payments, implement Radar for regional fraud, and automate vendor payouts. If helpful, I can tailor it to your tech stack and location mix.
touches.hints: Attach a 1‑page playbook and offer a tailored follow-up session
